#summary Contributing to trace-viewer

* [http://dev.chromium.org/developers/how-tos/install-depot-tools Install the depot tools]

* Get the source with git svn
{{{
git svn clone https://trace-viewer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ trace-viewer
}}}

* Make a branch:
{{{
git checkout -t -b mybranch git-svn
}}}

* Iteratively:
{{{
... make edits
git commit -a -m "My change"
git cl upload
}}}

* When you've gotten LGTM
{{{
git cl dcommit
}}}
